channel.title: vZDV - Client Files Feed
channel.description: The latest client files from the vZDV ARTCC. Subscribe to this feed to be pinged when new files are released. Doing so will allow you to more quickly be alerted to new releases and stay up to date with your files.
channel.copyright: Copyright Â© 2014 Virtual Denver ARTCC. All Rights Reserved.

item.title: VRC Sector File 5.4 Released
item.description:
Changes include:

  • Updated VORs, NDBs, FIXs, and Airways to 1412 AIRAC.

item.title: VRC Sector File 5.2 Released
item.description:
Changes include:

  • Updated VORs, NDBs, FIXs, and Airways to 1307 AIRAC.
  • Changed magnetic variation of entire file to 8deg east (from 8.0)deg east. This is due to the resurveying of KDEN (2015).
  • Added back in the KEAR shelf, which modified DEN_CTR's boundary with ZMP. It got omitted somewhere along the way, but has always been active.
  • Added BAYLR ONE
  • ANCHR ONE becomes ANCHR TWO
  • CREDE ONE becomes CREDE TWO
  • FRNCH ONE becomes FRNCH TWO
  • JAGGR ONE becomes JAGGR TWO
  • KOHOE ONE becomes KOHOE TWO
  • MOLTN ONE becomes MOLTN TWO
  • PEEKK ONE becomes PEEKK TWO
  • ZPLYN ONE becomes ZPLYN TWO
  • PIKES FIVE radials updated due to the resurveying of KDEN (2015).
  • PLAIN FIVE radials updated due to the resurveying of KDEN (2015).
  • YELLO SEVEN radials updated due to the resurveying of KDEN (2015).
  • ROCKI EIGHT becomes ROCKI NINE, and radials updated due to the resurveying of KDEN (2015).
  • EEONS ONE becomes EEONS TWO (very small change between EEONS and LUPTN)
  • EMMYS ONE becomes EMMYS TWO
  • EXTANS ONE becomes EXTANS TWO
  • YOKES ONE becomes YOKES TWO
  • Deleted COTTN2 (Discontinued KEGE SID)
  • DBERRY ONE becomes DBERRY TWO
  • RCA ONE becomes RCA TWO
  • ALCOS THREE becomes ALCOS FOUR
  • JNC FIVE becomes JNC SIX
  • SKARF ONE becomes SKARF TWO
  • Updated VORs, NDBs, FIXs, and Airways to 1301 AIRAC.
item.author: casey@denartcc.org (Casey Diers)

item.title: VRC Sector File 5.1 Released
item.description:
Changes include:

  • Updated VORs, NDBs, FIXs, and Airways to 1301 AIRAC.
  • Reordered D01 RNAV STARs to make more sense. They now start at the 12 oclock entry gate and rotate around D01 clockwise. And the correspond, so if you need to switch someone on a LN STAR to a LS STAR, you can open the menu. If they are on the third down LN STAR, you can look at the LS section, go down three, and that is the star you need to switch them to.
  • New SID at KDEN: YOKES ONE
  • New SID at KDEN: BRYCC ONE
  • New SID at KDEN: YOKES ONE
  • New SID at KDEN: EEONS ONE
  • New SID at KDEN: EMMYS ONE
  • New SID at KDEN: EXTAN ONE
  • New SID at KDEN: EPKEE ONE
  • New SID at KDEN: JMPRS ONE
  • New SID at KDEN: STAKR ONE
  • New SID at KDEN: SPAZZ ONE
  • New SID at KDEN: SOLAR ONE
  • New SID at KDEN: CONNR ONE
  • New SID at KDEN: COORZ ONE
  • New SID at KDEN: FOOOT ONE
  • New SID at KDEN: YAMMI ONE
  • KIPPR ONE becomes KIPPR TWO
  • New STAR at KAPA: PUFFR TWO
item.author: casey@denartcc.org (Casey Diers)

item.title: vSTARS D01 Facility Released - 101453
item.description:
Changes include:

  • Added in several additional D01 airports so that arrivals correctly show up as arrivals instead of over-flights.
item.author: casey@denartcc.org (Casey Diers)

item.title: VRC Sector File 4.9 Released
item.description:
Changes include:

  • Updated VORs, NDBs, FIXs, and Airways to 1211 AIRAC.
  • Added in runway lines at KDEN. These are the overlays, so that when airport graphics are off, you can still view the runway center lines.
  • Per Nils (ATM) Request, made the center MVAs a more predominate color, utilizing the existing taxiway color.
item.author: casey@denartcc.org (Casey Diers)

item.title: VRC Sector File 4.8 Released
item.description:
Changes include:

  • Updated VORs, NDBs, FIXs, and Airways to 1206 AIRAC. NOTE: This is the first release that has all Airways both high and low correctly displayed. While this will ensure accuracy, it is highly discouraged that controllers operating on lower end computers attempt to view all airways at once.
  • LANDR5 becomes LANDR6
  • SAYGE6 becomes SAYGE7
  • TOMSN4 becomes TOMSN5
  • Corrected, updated and added so all 'runways' are displayed for all displayed airports (those with published approaches).
  • Added in runway center lines at all class C and D airports per request from training department. NOTE: E's omitted to avoid clutter, B's omitted because they are represented in appropriate video maps.
  • Rearranged SIDs/STARs Menu
  • Reverted Center Splits to their arrangement prior to 8-23-11. See ZDV SOP v4.0 for details.
item.author: casey@denartcc.org (Casey Diers)

item.title: vSTARS D01 Facility Released - 91352
item.description:
Changes include:

  • Allow 4 character scratch pad entries.
  • Display requested altitudes in departure aircraft data blocks.
  • Updated departure auto scratch pad entries so they are only set when aircraft have PLAINS, PIKES, ROCKI, or YELLO DP with a valid transition listed in their flight plan.
item.author: casey@denartcc.org (Casey Diers)

item.title: VRC Sector File 4.7 Released
item.description:
Changes include:

  • Added KANK to video map.

  • Added KPSO to video map.
  • Added 8V7 to video map.
  • Added 3K3 to video map.
  • Added KHLC to video map.
  • Update ZLC Splits per documents from ZLC DATM Jon Stoops.
  • Deleted random other lines from previous neighboring artcc splits.
  • Cleaned up KCPR Video map and updated runway numbers.
  • Updated KDRO runway numbers.
  • Added KGLD rwy 17/35.
  • Added MLF waypoint to J28.
  • Added MTU and CHE waypoints to J24.
  • Updated V211 in accordance with 1202 AIRAC.
  • Updated VORs, NDBs, and FIXs to 1202 AIRAC.
item.author: casey@denartcc.org (Casey Diers)

item.title: VRC Sector File 4.2.1 Released
item.description:
Changes include:

  • Bug that warranted mid release update: Added back in KCOS airport diagram
  • Updated the PLAIN4 HCT initial heading marker. Updated due to magnetic variation. was 062°, now 061°.
item.author: casey@denartcc.org (Casey Diers)

item.title: VRC Sector File 4.2 Released
item.description:
Changes include:

  • Changed primary video map colors from ARTS greenish color to definable within VRC
  • Updated / Changed how diagrams are displayed in the SIDs and STARs columns
  • Changed KDEN airport diagram to a prettier and more accurate one. Thanks Marcus ZDV_MC.
  • Updated KPUB taxiway labels to reflect their real world counterpart. Realistic .bgl file for FSX on the way.
  • Added in all runway labels to nearly all runways in the ARTCC. Thanks Marcus ZDV_MC.
  • Enabled easy deactivation and reactivation of Runway and Taxiway labels. Open the file with notepad and see lines 15 and 16 for instructions on how to do so. See below for details.
  • Added airport diagram to KBKF - Buckley AFB and KRCA - Ellsworth AFB. Thanks Marcus!
  • Updated AIRAC to 1105 (IE all fixs, VORs, and NDBs should be up to date with the FAA)
  • KGJT: Monument 2 replaces Glade Park 1.
  • KASE: Updated from LINDZ5 to LINDZ6
  • KGCC: Added in RNAV Procedures and tweaked existing scope labels.
  • Added in new DEN ATCT video maps. These depict DEN ATCT airspace, as well as the DEN ATCT departure corridors into D01, and video maps for the ATCT to utilize during different landing configurations.
  • removed lots of duplicate entries, making the file about 20% smaller
  • Updated Magnetic Variation, so expect to see your scope rotated slightly. This should make your vectors more accurate by about 1.6°.
  • Added back in all FIXs required to display SIDs in our diagram list but not in our ARTCC, as those had gotten deleted at some point.
  • Many other minor improvements.
  • Note regarding turning on and off taxiway and runway labels:
    One of the problems with using a combined file for all positions is that traditionally the labels column must be either all on or all off. This is not a problem until you get up to radar positions where your scope is zoomed out all the way. The problem is that these labels actually scale up, making it impossible to, for example, see anything within about a 15mi radius around KDEN because all you can see is a large mass of bright white labels all jumbled on top of each other. I have come up with a solution. At the request of the training department, all sector files from here on out will ship with all labels displayed. This is to lower the burden on our newer students. If, however, any of our controllers would like to turn off these labels, all you must do is:
    1. Open the sector file in notepad or some similar text editing program.
    2. Navigate to line 16 to modify Runway Labels and line 17 to modify Taxiway Labels
    3. Delete the first character on the line, the semicolon (";").
    4. Save the file.
    5. In VRC, type in the text box ".reloadsector"
    • To re-enable them, simply add that semicolon (";") back at the beginning of the line.
item.author: casey@denartcc.org (Casey Diers)
